title: Front-End Developer
description: Our team is looking for a Front-End Developer with at least 1 year of experience in web development. The candidate should be skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and be proficient in frameworks like React and Angular. Experience with design tools like Figma or Sketch is a bonus. A Bachelor's degree in Web Development, Computer Science, or a related field is required. Certification in 'Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate' will be considered a strong advantage.
